title: Careers
subtitle: The French Revolution constituted for the conscience of the dominant aristocratic class a fall from innocence, and upturning of the natural chain of
text: Why consider a future with Cardinal Health? As a global, growing company, we’re able to offer rewarding careers that let you make a positive impact on our customers and communities. We think of ourselves as the business behind healthcare because we focus on making it more cost-effective. We're an essential link that allows healthcare providers to reduce costs, improve operations and increase quality, so that they can offer better care to their patients. Here are a few facts about us:
